content: {"name": "Mercer County Nutrition Program for Older Adults (John O. Wilson Hamilton Neighborhood Service Center)", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Open to anyone 60 years old or older and their spouses (regardless of age), any county resident with a disability whose primary caregiver is a program participant, anyone volunteering in the program, and the personal care aides of program participants (when they accompany a participant to the site where meals are provided). This program encourages participants to make a suggested donation of $1 for their daily meal. Participants must register for the program by calling 609-989-6650. Transportation can be made available, anyone interested can contact the program for details.", "email": "", "url": "https://www.mercercounty.org/departments/human-services/aging-disability-resource-connection/office-on-aging/nutrition-program-for-older-adults", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "169 Wilfred Avenue", "address_2": null, "city": "Hamilton Township", "state_province": "NJ", "postal_code": "08610", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.203369, "longitude": -74.72831430000001}, "phones": [{"number": "(609) 989-6650", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "16:00", "closes_at": "18:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "16:00", "closes_at": "18:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "16:00", "closes_at": "18:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "16:00", "closes_at": "18:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "16:00", "closes_at": "18:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Call in advance for services"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Seniors and people with disabilities"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed on major holidays"}]}
